metadata.title: CVE-2022-0109 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Autofill in Google Chrome prior to97.0.4692.71 allowed a remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitiveinformation via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
